attributes.title: WORST APP ON APP STORE
attributes.review: I was very excited to download this app, to be able to educate myself. This app took HOURS to download. The app took about 6 hours to completely download and once I was able to open the app, some disturbing pictures popped up on the screen. I will not go into details because I do not want anyone reading this review to have to hear about the horrifying thing that I saw, but to give people an idea it was some disturbing orange man, who appeared to have no lips what so ever and very small eyes. Not only was I so disturbed to see this but it was only the start. After that thing popped up on my phone my screen completely shattered, destroying my phone, that I worked very hard to buy myself. I was beyond terrified at this point, so I quickly ran to my parents and when I arrived back, we saw something so unbelievable. There was a line of roaches marching towards my phone chanting vote for trump. Our ears started bleeding from hearing  such horrific chanting. We all felt so sick to our stomachs, we all got in the car and rushed to the E.R, we were there for WEEKS. Not only that but after arriving home from the hospital we had to call an exterminator to get rid of the millions of roaches that filled our home. Downloading this app was definitely traumatizing. I hope this review spreads awareness and I hope I can save people from downloading this app and going through what my family had to experience. If there was a 0 star rating, I would have rate it 0 Instead. This app doesn’t even deserve 1 star, it is a disgrace to humanity.
